title: Zynga 's quarterly revenue from Q4 2012- Q3 2019
summary: This bar chart has 28 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '14.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars of Quarter Q3 '19 is 2.25% larger than the minimum value at Q2 '14.
min_summary: This bar chart has 28 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 345.29 is found at Quarter Q3 '19 and the minimum is found at Q2 '14 where Quarter is 153.23.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 28 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q3 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '14.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 28 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Quarter Q3 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '14.
The difference of Revenue in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Quarter is 192.06.
Quarter Q3 '19 is higher than any other Quarters with value 345.29, followed by Q4 '12, and Q2 '19. Down to Quarter Q2 '14 with the lowest value 153.23.
Over the past 28 Quarters, the Revenue in million U.S. dollars has reduced.
The Quarter Q3 '19 has 1.59 times more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 6066.78.
